bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Major General William Booth Taliaferro commanded the 4th Division Virginia Militia stationed in Charlestown, Virginia, after John Brown's Raid on Harper's Ferry.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Military Order Book contains general orders issued by Major General William Booth Taliaferro and his subordinates following John Brown's Raid between November 23, 1859 and January 19, 1860. The orders primarily consist of officer's assignments, troop movements, and discharges. Of particular note is General Order No. 25 which details the orders for the day of John Brown's execution.
